channel.title: Error connecting to server (help)
channel.description: So, I restarted to my computer to factory settings for multiple reasons. I have downloaded Skype, jre7, jdk 8u11, and for some reason every server I try to log on to play I get the error "error connecting to server". Someone please give me suggestions or help me :\ I cant figure out the problem.

item.title: Error connecting to server (help)
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

You might need to download a server’s client to play. Not all will connect off the Moparscape default client.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server (help)

item.description:
